rules.specification: class with method with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Outgoing" or annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Incoming" must have annotation "javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" or annotation "javax.enterprise.context.Dependent"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.inject.RestClient" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.jwt.Claim" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
field with type "org.eclipse.microprofile.jwt.JsonWebToken" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
class with method with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.Query" or annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.Mutation" must have annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.GraphQLApi"
class with method with parameter with annotation "javax.ws.rs.PathParam" must have annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path" or method with annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path"
method with parameter with annotation "javax.ws.rs.PathParam" must have annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path" or enclosing class with annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
